name: Spellarium 3
description: Spellarium 3 is one of our first games in the Match 3 Puzzle genre. The keyword is 'Puzzle,' which means that sometimes (not always!) you'll complete the level faster by removing objects in the correct order. If you feel a lack of challenge, you can also play Timed or Moves Limited modes. Additionally, there are Spot The Difference, Hidden Object scenes, Solitaires, a story, and a town to build!
